T

TransformMojo - Class in io.wcm.maven.plugins.slinginitialcontenttransform
Extracts Sling-Initial-Content from an OSGi bundle and attaches two artifacts with classifiers: bundle: OSGi bundle without the Sling-Initial-Content content: Content packages with the Sling-Initial-Content transformed to FileVault
